name: Grand Theft Chariot
description:
STEAL CHARIOTS

They weren't being used anyway.

LOOT THINGS

Finders keepers.

SPLAT CENTURIONS

They probably had it coming.

GO ON A RAMPAGE

We'll pretend we don't know you.

Please don't hurt the pedestrians.

What did they ever do to you?

GRAND THEFT CHARIOT

Live your best hoodlum life in a mixed up ancient world. In this world, there are no rules. At least, the rules don't apply to you.

Complete your missions, escape the city.

CONTROLS

Use WASD to control your character or chariot

Move the mouse to aim

Left click to swing your sword

Right click to shoot your crossbow

Press F to interact with locations

Press J to show/hide your mission objective

Presented by Emberspawn Studios as part of Godot Wild Jam 42
